duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deliver creative, community-focused projects in the public realm, rooted in Glenside, Pennsylvania.
Lead a cohort of student apprentices and work with the Project Coordination Team to facilitate relationships between community stakeholders and University resources.
Conduct community research and deliver a virtual artist lecture to introduce themselves to the Arcadia-Glenside community.
Work with student apprentices to produce the project and participate in an opening event for the project.

education_certification.credential: BFA or the equivalent in art or a comparable field. An MFA or other master's degree is encouraged.
